title: woman guard: medium-light skin tone

verbs: To protect; to keep from harm or injury.
Maintain in safety from injury, harm, or danger
To keep safe; to defend; to guard; to prevent harm coming to.
To keep something or someone safe or prevent harm coming to someone or something.
To protect from danger; to secure against surprise, attack, or injury; to keep in safety; to defend.
To prevent, to keep (from doing something).
To safeguard a resource from attack or loss.
nouns: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.

An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
A person who, or thing that, protects or watches over something.
Person who or thing that protects something.
A person who keeps watch over something or someone
A person who protects or watches over something.

description: The Female Guard, Type-3 emoji is a sequence of the  Guardsman,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-3, ? Female Sign and ? Variation Select
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman guard emoji, rendered in a medium-light skin tone, stands tall with a serious yet approachable expression, her uniform depicted with crisp lines and subtle shading. The realistic lighting and glossy 3D finish give her a professional and authoritative presence, characteristic of Apple's attention to detail. This emoji, with its strong posture and confident gaze as seen on Apple devices, symbolizes protection, vigilance, and a sense of duty, often used to convey security or to acknowledge those in protective roles.
